Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Provides for the return of persons to custody for violations of conditions of presumptive release, parole, conditional release or post-release supervision; repealer
Summary: Provides for the return of persons to custody for violations of conditions of presumptive release, parole, conditional release or post-release supervision.
LawCode: Rpld §259 subs 5 - 8, §259-i sub 3 ¶(a) sub¶¶ (iv) - (viii), sub¶¶ (ix) & (x), subs 4-a & 9, amd §259-i, Exec L; rpld §70.40 sub 4, amd §§70.40 & 70.45, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the penal law, in relation to providing for the return of persons to custody for violations of conditions of presumptive release, parole, conditional release or post-release supervision; and to repeal certain provisions of such laws relating thereto
